name: P2R Power Rev Racing
description:
P2R Power Rev Racing is an arcade racer with over 50 Japanese style race cars, Online Racing and easy swipe controls. Build up an awesome car collection and prove that you are the best racer in our active online community. You have the Power To Rev!

*Over 50+ Cars
*1/2 Mile Roll Racing
*Easy Swipe Gear Shift Controls
*Vehicle Upgrades
*Facebook Login
*Online Multiplayer Racing
*Leaderboards
*Active Community
*Drag Racing
*Dyno Pulls
